A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The worst Star Wars movie so far (Yes\, including the prequels and Rogue One).
Basically nothing happens the whole movie that moves the plot forward\, except for the two obvious death. The humour feels like it's from a bad sitcom. All of the scenes including Finn or Poe are useless. Phasma came back from the trash compactor just so she can fall in a pit of fire. It is still a mystery to me why Rose's character is in this movie. There is way to much Fan-service : Here comes Yoda's ghost controlling lightning\, Leia can fly in space\, Rey and Ben can have FaceTime Force conversations.
The actors are still terrible\, the twists are obvious\, there are plot holes everywhere.
And the list does not stop there.
However\, there are a two good scenes :
-	Rey and Ben's fight against the praetorian guards
-	The « light speed kamikaze attack »
For thoses two reasons\, I won't give TLJ the worst grade possible.
